newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombian peso drops to 1,079.00 in active trade.
newsitem.headline: Colombian peso drops to 1,079.00 in active trade.

text.p: BOGOTA, May 8 Reuter - Colombia's peso shed 7.3 pesos against the dollar in active midday trade after falling under pressure from a speculative surge in demand for U.S. currency, interbank dealers said.
The peso closed up 6.8 Wednesday at 1,071.70, but it erased all its gains by noon local time.
"It's a purely speculative market," one dealer said. "People want to move it the dollar up at any cost."
Dealers reported an above-average 505 trades in the session to midday for a total of $227.4 million.
